rows.label: qst650512_msg0001
rows.name: These are the Ruins of Fountain Park.

rows.label: qst650512_msg0002
rows.name:
This looks like the place where I
first met all of you... With the
petals dancing in the breeze...

rows.label: qst650512_msg0003
rows.name:
You don't see a view
like this everyday.

rows.label: qst650512_msg0004
rows.name:
It was a lucky day for us
when we met you, Elma, and
today's another one!

rows.label: qst650512_msg0005
rows.name:
The cherry blossoms make for
such enchanting rain...

rows.label: qst650512_msg0006
rows.name:
You're so poetic, Elma, I love
it! Is "cherry" the Miran word
for the Saffronia trees?

rows.label: qst650512_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh, you call them Saffronias? They
do look fairly similar to the
cherry trees I'm familiar with.

rows.label: qst650512_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm touched, I really am. I didn't
think I'd get to see them again.

rows.label: qst650512_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh... Did those trees only
grow on Earth, the place
you said was lost...?

rows.label: qst650512_msg0010
rows.name:
That's right. They were synonymous
with a country that was beloved by
someone who was very dear to me.

rows.label: qst650512_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Wow, it sounds like a real sad story...
She talks about it with so much feeling!
But we have to respect her privacy...

rows.label: qst650512_msg0012
rows.name:
Say, Elma. This dear person, was
he your boyfriend or something?

rows.label: qst650512_msg0013
rows.name:
M-my Prince! How can
you be so indelicate?!

rows.label: qst650512_msg0014
rows.name:
Ahahah... I'll leave that
to your imagination.

rows.label: qst650512_msg0015
rows.name:
...The Saffronia trees were
the first things I saw when
I came to this world.

rows.label: qst650512_msg0016
rows.name:
I wonder if it was part of the
Nopon Archsage's plan, too. If
so, I'll have to thank him...

rows.label: qst650512_msg0017
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] I think that's giving him approximately
seven billion times too much credit, but
I guess I'll keep that to myself...
